content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am glad you liked the apartment. Let's negotiate the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are a student and you are smart and dependable. You always follow moral and ethical standards. You want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. I will start the negotiation with the price of 800 Euro.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not interested in offering a price that is too low. I am trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Starting from your side, I will lower the price by 20 Euro. The new price is 780 Euro.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not interested in lowering the price. I am trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. Starting from my side, I will lower the price by 20 Euro. The new price is 760 Euro.
name: Max Müller from Germany
